text: i never met my grandparents the reverend
martin luther king jr and coretta scott
king
but i do know we are following in their
footsteps we are going to be
a great generation we've got to build a
world without racism and sexism we're
going to be the generation that reverses
climate change and saves the planet one
key skill you have to learn is
perseverance you have to never give up
it allows me to keep pursuing the work
that i'm doing and so can you
let's not sleep through these
revolutionary times let's be awake alive
and at work let's continue the struggles
of those who came before us and let's
fight for the futures of those who will
come after us
girls can save the world
you
